Text:
This book is helpful for me. Much appreciated. Thanks.

And I like you've adapted the name I call you BBS. Thats preety cool and friendly. Better you remove the full-stops within. I don't ever wanna see you stopped mate. :)

Thanx once again for this book and all your efforts.

@F1
Your welcome

And,yes BBS sounds better

Thanks F1
Bloody hell, you've got me on welding now! It started with your collection of woodworking publications and, god knows, where it will end! Thank you so much, BBS, for my re-education.
